---
title: Ravioli
description: John's famous ravioli
categories: [Meal]
Cook Time: 2 hours
---

## Filling

- Spinach
- Celery
- Yellow onions
- Garlic
- Meats
- Marjoram
- Thyme
- Johnnies seasoning
- Seasoned breadcrumbs
- Parmesan cheese (granulated)
- Ricotta cheese

## Pasta

- 3 1/2 cups flour
- 2/3 cup water
- 3 eggs
- 1/4 cup olive oil
- 1 tsp salt
